title.rendered: TUTTO SPORT: Carbon, the e-bike ready for adventure!

content.rendered:
TUTTO SPORT: Carbon, the e-bike ready for adventure!

Press/News

https://www.tuttosport.com/news/motori/due-ruote/2021/09/17-85432617/moto_parrilla_carbon_e-bike_pronta_per_l_avventura_

Moto Parilla Carbon Ebike

Developed by Moto Parrilla for all lovers of nature and two-wheeled pedals, the Carbon e-bike is presented on the market with a construction in different materials that make it as attractive as it is aggressive in its shapes.

The structure and components of the model of the Italian motorcycle manufacturer in fact boast a combination of different materials: from carbon to the aluminum of the frame, up to the special parts that have been CNC machined with aeronautical aluminum alloys.

Handcrafted in Reggio Emilia, Carbon boasts characteristics and qualities that are truly noteworthy.

Both the distinctive parallelogram fork and the motorcycle-like frame are constructed of carbon and aluminum , as well as the 26 “wheels with fat tires, which provide not only better balance for beginners and occasional riders, but also better grip and traction on the roughest terrain, and the swingarm with cantilever and air shock absorber.

Along with all this, the Moto Parrilla e-bike features a wide-angle LED rear light incorporated into the frame, a handcrafted genuine leather saddle, massive, hydraulically operated oversized disc brakes and a custom display with Bluetooth connection. and Quad Lock phone holder.

Positive notes also with regard to propulsion. In fact, embedded in the frame of the Carbon is a high-performance brushless motor, which promises reliability and generous power given by the 250W and the 48V 13.6 Ah lithium-ion battery.
